scripts.build:sqlite-otel: echo 'Starting build...' && rm -rf dist/sqlite-otel && mkdir -p dist/sqlite-otel/docs && echo 'Copying original static site to root...' && cp -r sqlite-otel/site/* dist/sqlite-otel/ && echo 'Copying MkDocs site to docs folder...' && cp -r mkdocs-build/* dist/sqlite-otel/docs/ && echo 'Build complete - original static site at root, MkDocs docs at /docs/'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist
